availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William P. Owen (Maynardville, Union County, Tennessee, farmer and deputy sheriff)

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farmer and deputy sheriff. Tennessee native. Married to Nancy Y. M. Owen. Father of Elizabeth Owen, Robert F. D. Owen, David H. T. Owen, Sarah Jane Owen, Arminta E. Owen, and Jacob L. Owen. Farmer in Grainger County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Maynardville in 1860. Deputy sheriff in Union County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Grainger County, District 15, p.128A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, Maynardville, p. 419.
KYR-0001-021-0031.
